body_html:
Yes, i wrote a custom code.
Basically im trying to use tf.contrib.losses.metric_learning.triplet_semihard_loss function to calculate loss.
it takes input as labels, embeddings so when i tried to use it with Y(?,1) and Z3(?,128).
it is throwing assertion error though those are valid inputs and the exact point where im getting assertion error is here

remaining fields are irrelevant so consider them as N/A

body:
Yes, i wrote a custom code.
Basically im trying to use `tf.contrib.losses.metric_learning.triplet_semihard_loss` function to calculate loss.
it takes input as labels, embeddings so when i tried to use it with Y(?,1) and Z3(?,128).
it is throwing assertion error though those are valid inputs and the exact point where im getting assertion error is [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/4bd6243e45f7e4c9757e32e499495ac1ec28f95f/tensorflow/contrib/losses/python/metric_learning/metric_loss_ops.py#L178)


remaining fields are irrelevant so consider them as N/A
